elements.text: You are having breakfast with a new friend. You have a tremor in your hand, and you notice your friend looking at you as you take a bite. You remember you've already shared about your PD, and the new friend has a lot of...

elements.name: New Friendship_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
